citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 PM on 05-24-
2023. The inspector arrived at the facility, rang the doorbell, called both numbers and left voicemails.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 PM on 05-24-
2023. The inspector arrived at the facility, rang the doorbell, called both numbers and left voicemails. 
 
 
 
End Section
